sig_info: Heimdall gains a 100% chance to trigger a Precision Buff increasing Critical Rating by 228.57 to 428.29 and lasting for 10 seconds, each time a True Strike Buff activates on him.

Heimdall converts all of the Buffs active on him at the end of the previous fight into Power. Start the fight with a Power Gain Buff granting 4 to 7.47% of his Max Power per Buff converted at the beginning of the fight, over 5 seconds.
